user_query: I would like to convert 1 cup of milk to grams using the Food Ingredient Measurement Conversion API. Furthermore, I'm interested in exploring some new recipes. Can you provide me with a list of cocktails and their names along with their IDs from The Cocktail DB?

TaskList.description: Convert 1 cup of milk to grams using the Food Ingredient Measurement Conversion API.
Fetch a list of cocktails with their names and IDs from The Cocktail DB.
